message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $115. I think it's a great deal, considering its value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $105 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a little more to $110. This is still a great price for you, considering the value of the product. Let's try to close this deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?

Bob, I really appreciate you trying to make this work, but $100 just isn't feasible for me right now.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105. That's a fair price for both of us. Let's close this deal now.
I understand you're trying to meet me halfway, but I really need to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
